short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click me to find the current time!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an extension that when clicked copies the current time and a question to another person in your chat about time. Whenever some person asks the time in chat if you are in different time zone, you can click this and copy the current time also the question what time is it on asker's place.
